text: The Somali sharp-snouted worm lizard (Ancylocranium somalicum) is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in Somalia and Ethiopia. ==References== Category:Ancylocranium Category:Reptiles described in 1930 Category:Taxa named by Giuseppe Scortecci
title: Somali sharp-snouted worm lizard
